channel.title: Ben Leskey's Blog
channel.description: Posts from the keys of Ben Leskey

item.title: 29th DCSS win: Naga Hexslinger
item.description: I just got my 29th win in the Dungeon Crawl: Stone Soup roguelike, playing a Naga Hexslinger of Hep. The morgue file from CKO is included below:…

item.title: I'm on diff.blog
item.description: I saw yesterday that diff.blog’s bot account on Github had starred the repository for this website. I clicked through to their Github page, which described diff.blog as an aggregator of developer blogs… started in 2019 to improve the visibility of self hosted blogs. I followed the directions in their README and signed in to diff.blog…

item.title: I made an RSS feed!
item.description: I made an RSS feed for my blog! It’s a really simple format; I was able to implement my feed just by following the RSS 2.0 spec. Of course, RSS readers are a little less common than they were a decade ago; but there are plenty of extensions for Firefox—I’m using RSSPreview just to test…

item.title: Mapping tool 0.5 release
item.description: Hello all! Here’s version 0.5 of the mapping tool! You can download it here: https://github.com/mapper1024/mapper1024/blob/master/DOWNLOAD.md#download-options You can use the online demo here: https://mapper1024.github.io/demo Once you’ve tested the new version, please fill out the feedback survey. You can click everything now! One of the primary bits of feedback I received was for a better user interface,…

item.title: benleskey.com build script
item.description: This website is static HTML, CSS, and Javascript. There is a build script that compiles together templates and HTML into the final website that you see, this bit of dynamicism enables me to reuse common HTML and keeps track of tedious bits like blog tag link lists. The script—as of writing—that compiles the website is…

item.description: Hi! Version 0.4 of the mapping tool is out! You can download it here: https://github.com/mapper1024/mapper1024/blob/master/DOWNLOAD.md#download-options You can use the online demo here: https://mapper1024.github.io/demo Once you’ve tested the new version, please fill out the feedback survey. New Renderer and Graphics Version 0.4 of the mapping tool has an updated graphics engine for drawing the maps. Terrain…

item.title: Mapping tool 0.3 release
item.description: Hello all! The next major version of my map making tool is released! You can download it here: https://github.com/mapper1024/mapper1024/blob/master/DOWNLOAD.md#download-options You can use the online demo here: https://mapper1024.github.io/demo Once you’ve tested the new version, please fill out the feedback survey. What’s New? Version 0.3 of the map making tool includes the following updates: Brush palette —…

item.title: Mapping tool 0.1 release
item.description: Hello! I’m happy to give you and the other testers the first working, testable version of my map making tool designed for authors and storytellers. The map making tool is currently usable to make rudimentary maps, with more improvements on the way–and your feedback is important! You can download it here: https://github.com/mapper1024/mapper1024/blob/master/DOWNLOAD.md#download-options You can use…
